## Dataset

The data set was download from Key2Stats: [https://www.key2stats.com/Students_Performance_in_Exams_1559_29.csv](https://www.key2stats.com/Students_Performance_in_Exams_1559_29.csv)

```{r}
# loads the data set in
students <- read.csv("https://www.key2stats.com/Students_Performance_in_Exams_1559_29.csv")

head(students)

# shows the descriptive statistics
summary(students[,c("math.score","reading.score","writing.score")])

table(students$gender)
table(students$race.ethnicity)
table(students$parental.level.of.education)


# Transform variable to get average score of three exams
students$average.score <-rowMeans(students[,c("math.score","reading.score","writing.score")])

head(students[,c("math.score","reading.score","writing.score","average.score")])

# creates a histogram showing frequency of average scores
hist(students$average.score,main="Histogram of Average Scores",xlab="Average Score",col="skyblue",border="white")

# creates a scatter plot of Math Scores vs Writing Scores
plot(students$math.score,students$writing.score,main="Scatterplot of Math Score vs Writing Score",xlab = "Math Score",ylab = "Writing Score", pch = 19,col="darkgreen")

```
